create_entry.refresh_message: You need to refresh the page after adding Card-mod Plus for Frontend resource to load. Click finish and then refresh the page.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of Card-mod Plus can be added.
abort.old_frontend_script_resource: Card-mod frontend script resource {resource} is registered as a Dashboard resource outside of Card-mod Plus. Please remove it before adding Card-mod Plus.
abort.old_frontend_script_extra_module: Card-mod frontend script resource {resource} is registered as an extra module outside of Card-mod Plus. Please remove it before adding Card-mod Plus.
